metadata.Title: CVE-2023-33461 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
iniparser v4.1 is vulnerable to NULL Pointer Dereference in function iniparser_getlongint which misses check NULL for function iniparser_getstring's return.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-33461` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libiniparser1 - 4.1-4ubuntu4.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: iniparser package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.1-4ubuntu4.1').
